summary: Some tattoos to be blended with your skin textures. Tested with UNP body.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/51982-1-1394497660.jpg[/img][/center]

[font=verdana][color=green][u][b]Description:[/font][/color][/u][/b]

First of all I'm not a modder and this is not really a mod, just textures that are intended to use by advanced users with Caliente's Texture Blender. This application is available on many sites, but I've downloaded it from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27352/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27352/?[/url] and if you not know how it works, I recommend that you read the excellent instructions that Svarog has written in this page.

These tattoos are based in the UNP body that is the one I currently use, so I don't know if that will not work as expected in other body models (for now I have not intention of make other versions).

I hope you like them.


[font=verdana][color=green][u][b]Installation:[/font][/color][/u][/b]

First of all make sure you have UNP installed.

The files must be copied in the same folder where you have installed TexBlend.exe. (The folders' structure is already in the .rar)

[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/51982-1-1394493539.jpg[/img][/center]

[font=verdana][color=green][u][b]Copyright:[/font][/color][/u][/b]

These tattoos are NOT made ​​by me, I downloaded all of them from Internet pages WITHOUT any copyright notice, but even so, if anyone believes that I violate any copyright (nothing further from my intention) let me know it and I will delete the corresponding file.


[font=verdana][color=green][u][b]Credits and Special Thanks:[/font][/color][/u][/b]

Caliente for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5737]Texture Blender[/url]
dimon99 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP Female Body[/url]
author: PeCool
